Package server.util

Class Deserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.util.Deserializer
  • public class Deserializer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deserializes both the Music and User JSON into POJOs. Contains data structures to hold: 1. the song info database (musicDatabase), 2. songs able to be played from the music folder (playableSongs), 3. a lookup of song information by release ID, and 4. the user's set of owned mp3s (from the music folder)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deserializer()
      Initializes the Deserializer and loads the music files from the filesystem.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<User> deserializeUsers()
      Parses the User JSON file and returns a list of User objects.
      java.util.List<Collection> getMusicDatabase()
      Returns the song information in the Music JSON as an ArrayList.
      java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> getOwnedIDs()
      Returns a dictionary of the user's owned mp3s in the music directory.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getPlayableSongs()
      Returns a dictionary of songs that CAN be played (the mp3 files exist in the music directory).
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Collection> getUserLibrary()
      Returns a dictionary of song information.
      void updateMusicOnFileAdd()
      Updates the music database; called when a file is added to DFS.

        Parses the User JSON file and returns a list of User objects.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getMusicDatabase

        public java.util.List<Collection> getMusicDatabase()
        Returns the song information in the Music JSON as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        A List of songs, as Collections, from the music database.

      • getOwnedIDs

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> getOwnedIDs()
        Returns a dictionary of the user's owned mp3s in the music directory.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of the User's owned MP3's.

      • getPlayableSongs

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getPlayableSongs()
        Returns a dictionary of songs that CAN be played (the mp3 files exist in the music directory). Key: song release ID Value: the mp3 file name (without '.mp3' extension)
        Returns:
        A HashMap of songs that the User can play.

      • getUserLibrary

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Collection> getUserLibrary()
        Returns a dictionary of song information. Key: song release ID Value: the song info as a Collection
        Returns:
        A HashMap of songs in the User's Library

      • updateMusicOnFileAdd

        public void updateMusicOnFileAdd()
        Updates the music database; called when a file is added to DFS.
